name: Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs
author: BoomDevs

Privacy Policy

Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs collects some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

BoomDevs does not gather any data by default. The tracking SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

BoomDevs tracking SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how BoomDevs collects and uses this data.

Support

If you have any questions, please email us at (contact@boomdevs.com)
sections.installation:
It’s very easy and straight forward to install this plugin. But before installing Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections make sure you’ve installed and activated Elementor.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen from your WordPress website dashboard.
  2. Search for Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it!

Manual Installation

  1. Download Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections.
  2. Extract the unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs.zip file. You’ll get plugin files inside unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen form your WordPress website dashboard.

Usage

After activating Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections you’re just 2 clicks away to add nesting sections/columns.

  1. Open a page to edit in Elementor mode.
  2. Right-click on a column where you want to have a nested section/column.
  3. Click the Add Nested Section from the options menu.

That’s it! You should have a nested column right away. You can manage these columns like any other Elementor column. Add a new column, use column settings and anything Elementor offers with a column.
